name: Candace J
text: Always a great selection, friendly staff and well organized.

name: Jacob Lovell
text: Found legos

name: Jaime Thomas
text:
I would leave zero stars if I could. Will not
Purchase anything from here again. Made an online purchase. Received email about my order and online receipt. Within 24 hours they charged my bank account 4 times. I attempted to call customer service. Can’t get anyone to help. Absolutely ridiculous.

name: Jennifer MacDonald
text: I've shopped here for a few years now...the prices are great & shipping has always been fast and effortless. But lately my orders have taken weeks to process and even longer to receive...usually receiving one item at a time, weeks apart. I've tried emailing customer service but have yet to receive a response either time. Very disappointed with this company lately

name: Michael Yancey
text: Strange my wife said we will not buy any children’s cloths here.  Awful customer service.

name: Victoria Woodyard
text: I visit this location on yesterday and by it being New Year Eve they closed down at 6pm which is understandable but the key holder was very rude and rush my transaction. I ask her a questions on unlinking my coupons from the app bag and she was not for it and when I finally decided to just use the two coupons and remain calm and respectful to the Cashier then she tried to help after I made my purchase which was too late, I just ignored her because I honestly didn’t want any unnecessary problems. But, thanks to the Cashier that had patience. Store Number 1430, Reg 2 checked out finally at 6:07PM.

name: Amanda Parker
text: Do not shop here. Childrens Place Customer Service is awful and not willing to help you. I contacted three different reps about an order an they all stated that basically the issue wasnt their problem and I would need to find other options to get it solved. Im soo disgusted with them and def suggest you take your business elsewhere. Very disappointing.

name: Desiree Eberhart
text: When I last shopped there the workers were in my way folding clothes. They seen me trying to look at the clothes but they were too busy running their mouth. I rather shop online in peace.

name: hua168 gao
text: DO NOT buy from this store,very bad customer service!!!!!

name: randy hall
text: Staff was far from impressive. They do not acknowledge you are even there. They do not ask to help you. If you ask a question expect a one word answer

name: Michelle
text: No store greeting which was fine but nor was I asked if I needed any help due to the heavy conversation between the employees. At checkout I even had to assure I was good for the promotions advertised using my member points, the staff were unaware of the store promotions going on. In my opinion, lazy and unhelpful staff.

name: Ciara Long
text: I love this store! They always have the best sales, not to mention everything was so well organized.

name: Jc Mcgill
text: Great deals and plenty of them!!! Great, friendly, helpful staff!!

name: Tammy Hoobler
text: Go place to shop.great time shopping there.

name: Jason Latham
text: Too expensive otherwise everything else was fine

name: Google ruined Youtube
text: Too expensive

name: Jacey Wise
text: Katilyn and Josie are the best !! They helped me find everything I needed and were super nice.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-Star Review!  Josie & Katilyn are the best😍

name: Amanda Kalina
text: Never disappoints! Always an awesome selection at reasonable prices! Staff has never been rude and I shop almost weekly there.

resp.text: We love you and your crew!  Thanks for your awesome review and for being our regular shopper!  See you soon!

name: Jennifer Kreps White
text: Great selection and inventory of kids clothes! Friendly and helpful staff.

resp.text: Thank you!  Look forward to seeing you soon!

name: Cyndi Patton
text: I love going here. Everyone is always so nice & helpful. Nice things at good prices!!

resp.text: Thank you Cyndi!  Thank you for being a loyal consignor and shopper!  Love ya!

name: Chanelle Collier
text: We love Bubble Gum & Blue Jeans. Great clothes and toys at a fantastic price.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the awesome review!

name: Heather Denson
text: This awesome consignment shop is always our first place to look when we are buying clothes, looking for shoes, and even looking for birthday presents! They always have a wide variety of gently used clothing, shoes, infant care items, and toys; but they also have a wide variety of brand new toys and dress up items! A big plus is that the staff is always polite and willing to help! Our family absolutely loves the store!

resp.text: Awe!  Thank you so much for your sweet words!  We love our customers!

name: Tommy Morgan
text: Super friendly. Will come back

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!  Hope to see you soon!

name: Jami Farr
text: The staff and owner are very welcoming.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-Star Review!  We appreciate you!

name: Amanda Cornelius
text: I love the simple & easy way 2 consign here. The clothes don't have 2 be on hangers, they provide a tote 4 your clothes or you can bring them in your own,  & you can pick up the money you made any day you choose instead of waiting till a certain time of the month. Friendly & helpful staff!!!!

resp.text: Thanks!  We appreciate you!

name: Melinda Bardill
text: I love it here.  Cute up to date selections.  Friendly staff, good prices.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5-Star Review!  We appreciate your business!

name: Holly McDowell
text: Great place for clothes!!! Very clean,great friendly staff... Very reasonable prices

resp.text: Thank you for your awesome review!  We appreciate you!

name: Ashley Posey
text: In my opinion this place use to be really good to shop at when they were in the old part of Cullman and very reasonable too.. However, I went to there new area just recently and they are just way to over priced for the clothes that they have. And the clothes looked well used too.. sorry I'd rather pay $2 more at the retailers store and by brand new than to buy second, third, fourth, etc hand..

resp.text: Thanks for your response!  Our pricing hasn’t changed much since our old location (4 years ago)😊.  We price based on condition, brand, and supply & demand.  Most of our prices range from 99 cents to $13.99.  That excludes our more expensive, boutique brands, of course, which are priced between $16.99 and $34.99, all very fair prices in the consignment world:)...thanks again for your feedback!

name: Donna McKnight
text: New and used clothing an toys. Good prices.  Friendly service

resp.text: Thank you so much for your 5-Star review!  We love our customers and look forward to seeing you soon!  Spring/Summer merchandise is going out soon!

name: Tina Luker
text: Great service. Very friendly.

name: Brandy Chambers
text: Awesome consignment store. The staff are incredibly helpful and friendly!

resp.text: Thank you!  We appreciate your business!

name: Kristie Bush
text: Absolutely love this place! We find great deals and it's super easy to consign here:)

resp.text: Thank you so much for your awesome review, Kristie!  We appreciate you consigning and shopping with us!

name: Cyndi Patton
text: Wonderful place to get kids clothes, toys and accessories. Employees are always friendly and the the owner Stacey always helpful.

resp.text: Thank you Cyndi, we appreciate you taking the time to leave a review.

name: Toni Bailey
text: Awsome shopping experience with helpful and friendly staff.

resp.text: Thanks for the review!  We appreciate your business!

name: Heather
text: Great store with great pricing!  Found a lot of things that my very picky 5 yr old loved!

resp.text: Thanks for the great feedback, Heather!  Hope you are doing well!  We've started a new customer loyalty program:)  Come by soon and check it out!

name: Local 360
text: Outstanding selection of children's clothing. Their selection fits our budget.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your 5-Star Review!  We appreciate your business!

name: Woody Jacobs
text: Great selection and the prices were very reasonable.

resp.text: Thank you Woody, we appreciate you taking the time to share your review.

name: Tyler and Jennifer Jacobs
text: Excellent place to get clothes at amazing prices.  I've heard nothing but great things, and highly recommend stopping in to shop here and check the place out.

resp.text: Thanks Tyler!

name: stephanie usher
text: Great Consignment Store!  Very well priced!!  Great employees!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your feedback, Stephanie!  We aim to please:)  Hope to see you soon!  If you haven't been in to try out our new customer loyalty program, you definitely need to!

resp.text: Thank you Chanda for taking the time to leave us a review!

resp.text: Thank you for your review!  Most of the clothing items in our store range in price from $1.99 to $7.99, with boutique brands being more costly due to their original price point being higher.  We appreciate your business😊

name: Cindy Chancellor
text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS STORE AND THE OWNER!

resp.text: Thank you Cindy!

name: Shanna Johnson
text: Loved the prices on things

resp.text: Thanks for your awesome review!  We appreciate your business!

resp.text: Thanks for the 5-Star Review!  We appreciate you!  Hope to see you soon!

name: Margaret Holmes
text: Good finds there

resp.text: Thank you!  Hope to see you again soon!

name: Tara Frontz
text: I'm only reviewing because there's people leaving reviews that are negative just because this is a baby/children's store! We love growing Trends. We shop and sell there!

name: Autumn Snyder
text: I only buy consigned for my children. Love this place!

name: Jessica Dingler
text: Baby clothes, maternity clothes, baby stuff

name: Megan Hendrick
text: A variety to choose from with low prices.

name: JRB
text: I just had the displeasure of going into this store today. The level of unprofessionalism is ridiculous. You have one employee walking around with hair wraps that are made for wearing to bed or anywhere else other than while at work. The older AA lady was rude. She literally carried on a conversation with the other employee that was checking people out. Their conversation wasn’t work related nor appropriate. I could have sworn some choice words were used among them that little ears shouldn’t hear. She not only took my phone out of my hand to scan the barcode instead of verbally asking me to position it (big no no as if she dropped it, who would pay because I shouldn’t have to) but had to scan it again because she was too busy talking to the other employee. She never told me which card to insert (I was completing a return) nor the total (glad I knew ahead of time). Then she was very disrespectful by ripping the receipt off the register and extended her arm for me to retrieve it as she continued to speak to the other employee never looking my way. Who acts like that and they’re supposed to be in customer service? On top of all that, the line was extremely long and there was no a/c. I’m accustomed to shopping online and in the store where I’m from, but I’ll pass on this location.

name: Alice Blonskij
text: I’ve ordered 3 times and had issues with two of the orders. They said I had to file a claim with USPS for a lost package. They have very poor customer service, and I mean POOR! I’ll never order from them again, it’s disgusting how they treat people. Take your money and make you fight for the package I never received. Never had I received such disgusting service

name: leah turner
text: This has been an awful experience. I buy items to give to kids in third world countires. I bought tons of the clearance clothes. When I received the packages, the packing slip claimed all the clothes were in the package, but were not. I have tried over and over to call customer service, and the automated just hangs up over and over. I cannot get to a representative. I pushed the email button but it will not send me to an email. It just send me to the shopping home page. I want the items that I paid for now!

name: Brittney Catchings
text: This store is slow as hell in everything they do! It’s freakin crazy! Best bet would be to go to the one in Foley! Much nicer and faster ! Customer service is 10 times better too!!

name: L Ross
text: I like their clothes and they have good sales. I have ordered online and had items shipped to my home with no issues. I decided to order my child's school uniforms and have them shipped to the store. That was a HUGE mistake! The estimated delivery was between 8/3-8/5. It is 8/5 and my order status indicates it is still processing at the facility. When the order status hadn't changed by 8/3 I ordered back ups to pick up in store the same day. I waited to pick them up thinking my other order would be there. I was wrong and there were other people whose orders had not arrived. So they were scrambling around the small, messy, packed store trying to find school uniforms. Some of the store associates had attitudes and weren't helpful. I was very disappointed because they did not even have the items I ordered to purchase in the store. I know it's not the store's fault my order wasn't ready, but the store needs to be better organized.

name: Erin Clarke
text:
I love the clothes, but I refuse to shop in store here. Every interaction I've had in store has been unpleasant. The employees are very rude, the store is too small for the amount of things in it; you can barely walk around, the wait time is ridiculous, and the return/exchange policy is ridiculous. I couldn't find my receipt and needed to exchange some polo shirts for a different color bc my daughter's school changed their policy, they told me they could only exchange for the same exact size and color, why anyone would need the same exact shirt for an exchange is beyond me. I have given many chances to this store thinking maybe I just came at bad times, but each and every time
Its ALWAYS the same.

name: M B
text: This has to be their worst store location. I’m not sure as to why it’s still open in Mobile. They need to completely revamp their employees and store structure. No customer service at all. Ship to store pick up is even horrible here. Now, I just ship directly to my home.

name: massey chandretia
text: Ordered my items online and only received 2 of 6 items. Had to argue with customer care to receive credit for my missing items. After receiving credit I reordered the items to pick up in store same day. Got to the store to pick up my order and the manager told me after waiting in line for 45 mins  they no longer had the items available because customers were still shopping in store after I placed my order online.

name: Jordyn Pierce
text: I normally love this store, even though it's pricey. But after today we will NEVER be back. I walked in to exchange a pair of boots my daughter got for Christmas yesterday still with the tags on. The moment I walked in, the sales lady, who was an older lady, was already giving me a go to hell look before I even spoke to her. She told me I had to go to another store and treated me like I had stolen the shoes. I wish I had caught her name because that lady should never be working with the public at all. I will be contacting corporate.

name: ChadW
text: This place is a joke.. slow, one person checking out 5 customers... while associate hangs clothes up in the store... during holiday season

name: Amanda Young
text: I had to take a pair of pants back because they didn’t take a security thing off. The customer service was horrible, they were beyond rude!!!! It’s a good thing I had the receipt! For it to be their mistake and act like they did was uncalled for!

name: Wendy Bond
text: Long time waiting in line while the customer service reps choose who they want to help and when. The sale prices can be great, but the employees' attitudes are what keep me away.

name: Cne mother
text: Love mrs Lon.

name: MeMe Tweetie
text: Website keeps freezing and wont allow me to checkout and complete purchase I have logged onto 4 different devices from cellphone tablet to laptop and same thing keeps happening it just suggest that i go into the store to complete purchase if i wantes to shop in store then i wouldnt not be online such an inconvenience!

name: 3BlackMartillo2 Gaming
text: Here now and the store clerk locked the door 10 minutes prior to closing. There’s still people in here

name: Shameka Collins
text: Horrible Customer Service. Management Watches Disrespectful Associates Talk Horribly To Their LOYAL Customers. And It Was During Christmas Season. Tried To Talk To Management She Didnt Even Care To Face Me Just Throwed An Im Sorry Over Her Shoulder.

name: Katie D
text: High prices, unorganized store and didnt appreciate the lady at the register on her phone the whole time I was trying to check out. Wont be back

name: CANJILLIA MCCREE
text: Worst place ever they didnt want to take back nor give me a credit my order was over 300$online i went in store to get a credit i recommend no one shop onlone or in store

name: Christine Cole
text:
An amazingly chic, unique, charming, one-of-a-kind gift shop located in the heart of Crestline! Every item in this shop is specially note-worthy; you'll want to see everything, touch everything, then take everything home! From gorgeous antiques to fun gifts, and everything in between- it's like a small excellently curated museum where all the items can be purchased!!!
And the owners are extremely friendly, have great taste and will assist you in finding the perfect gift for children, the person who's impossible to shop for, and even something extraordinary for yourself (like the beautiful jewelry, handbags, or humorous hand-towels, keychains...) Really there is something for EVERYONE here!
Add it to your 'Must-visit' list!

name: Hastings Crockard
text: A must-stop shop in the heart of Crestline. Beautifully curated gifts, art, antiques and furniture!

name: Geoffrey Crane
text: It’s a little Neiman Marcus right in the heart of Crestline!

name: Dawn Productions
text: Absolutely love this store. Everyone is always so nice. And it’s always clean and neat!!!

name: Shaquita Powe
text: The manager was very nonchalant and nasty. They wouldn't take me e-certificate /giftcard. And locked the doors on me and my family at 7PM and store hours says 9pm. I wouldn't recommend anyone to go in that kind of atmosphere. I did have that problem in Trussville when i left leeds.

name: Jade Underwood
text: When I visited this store is was a very good experience, the staff was attentive & friendly & the store was very orderly, stocked, & clean. It was stellar compared to the other neighboring store. This was by FAR the best staff we interacted with too.

name: Cindy brasher
text: Love this store...

name: Christa Whitman
text: I will never shop at this store again. I understand the whole mask thing but if someone tells you they have a medical issue that prevents them from wearing one leave them alone. It's hard enough for us to have to deal with all the Karen's that think we are just doing it for no reason now I cant even shop for my son. I had to put my stuff down and was asked to leave. Its sad that you allow your employees to treat people that way.

name: Nicholas Nicholas
text: Very clean and up to date kids wear.

name: Ketti Johnson
text: I will order online and have it shipped to me from now on.  I was not pleased with the pick-up process at the store.  Online is the way to go, plus it seems the prices are better.

name: Midian DiNardo
text: Did not have a good experience ordering online.   Live store experience is different-heard great things.   My online ordering experience was not pleasant and I do not recommend it.

name: xunkidnerz
text:
DO NOT ORDER ONLINE!!
I order a package over two weeks ago and still have not recieved it. I called customer service three times to try to get help. I was told no one could find my package. Then they said I had the wrong tracking number. Then they said I had to contact the shipper for a different tracking number. I explained to the rep that this was the only form of contact the website provides. Literally no one would help me. Then instead of a refund they just wanted to make another shipment (which would take another two weeks to deliver) . Please dont waste your time and money.

name: Virginia Buffkin
text: Rude, unprofessional, racist. Was in there today about to make a $150 purchase and the associate snapped at me. I left my selected purchase on the counter and walked out.  Amazing. This was the first time I had been in PPM this year and was walking between Dillard's and another store and saw children's clothes at this place. Never again. Get a hint. Nowadays, it's all about customer loyalty at brick-and-mortar stores and you blew it.

name: Jewell Gamble Caldwell
text: I went into the store 10 minutes before store closing, they told me I could not shop. I proceed to tell her I only wanted denim in a size 14. "We're closed," with an attitude.

name: L Wilson
text: We love Children's place but I will order online. I do not enjoy going in this store. The staff have no professionalism, they do not greet you and barely tolerate you when you make a purchase. They need to work on their customer service and get new management.

name: Emily Dudley
text: I purchased a pair of shoes from this store, but after my daughter wore them one day, the bow fell off. So, the following business day, I took them back to the store to see if I could replace them. My review is based on the owner’s attitude when I approached the counter. She immediately let me know “I was the only person to ever have an issue with those shoes.” She also remarked “I mean, they cost $28, so you get what you pay for.” I felt very stupid by the time I left the store. I decided to just keep the shoes, but take the bow off the other shoe so both shoes will at least match. I had been warned by other friends who’ve shopped there that the owner is rude and customer service is lacking, but I now know for myself! I’ve spent a lot of money there over the past year, but will not be going back.

name: Vannah Norrell
text: Best place anywhere for little ones!!

name: Dexter Hunter
text: Awesome place and great customer service. Also good prices with quality products. Recommend highly.

resp.text: Thanks so much Dexter! We like to keep our customers happy!!

name: landa440
text: I was warmly welcomed as soon as I came in. I was looking for a special square toe boot and they helped me find the best fit for the price. They gave me care tips and helpful info on how to weatherproof my boots. I highly recommend them for any clothing or boot needs.

resp.text: Thank you so much! It was our pleasure!!

name: jeni ray
text: I love my Twisted X boots they are so comfortable

resp.text: We are so glad!! Thank you for shopping with us!!

name: Jennifer Haskew
text: Love to shop local. Have been here numerous times for gifts or boots. Love to get the leather wallets. They last for so long. The staff is always nice and accommodating.

name: james burling
text: Picked up a nice felt last year, they trimmed it and all. Great service.

name: Tammy Helms
text: I have bought boots, jeans, shirts and hats here multiple times! Love this place and will definitely be back time and time again! Thanks ladies!❤️

resp.text: Thank you Tammy! We love our customers!!!

name: Lee Lee

name: Cyndi Cardwell

resp.text: Thanks so much Cyndi! We appreciate you!!

name: norman cale

name: David Shipp

text: Brenda and Janet are the nicest people! Wonderful selection of western wear for the whole family!

resp.text: We always enjoy waiting on you, Earl!!!

text: She will get you exactly what you want or need,  very nice store

resp.text: Thank you William!! We really appreciate it!!

name: Stephanie Still
text: Great people. Helpful great customer service. have layaway.

name: Stinger000
text: They were helpful from the time we walked In to when we left couldn't ask for a better experience.

name: Kelley Bryant
text: First time shopper and will be back!!!!! I had a wonderful experience!!! Janis was so helpful!!! Love it and them!!!! Thanks

name: Richard Caraway
text: Great place and awsome service

resp.text: Thank you so much!! We sure do try!!

name: Kelly Smith
text: Friendly service, very helpful. Big selection. Highly recommend.

name: Marvin Mobley
text: Nice folks did everything to help me

name: CptnComplicated
text: The people here are amazing. I find myself going out of my way to spend money here because of the great atmosphere and the top quality products that are available.

name: Greg Schneider
text: Nice folks great selection!

name: Norma Stewart
text: I love this store.  For a small town they got it

resp.text: Thank you Norma! We strive for excellent customer service!

name: Anthony Schneider
text: I like to buy boots here because they have a decent selection for Atmore, and fairly reasonable pricing. Also their customer service is great if you have problems with them.

name: Rebecca Lister
text: Great merchandise

name: Crazy Cowboy Trucking
text: Great service

resp.text: Thank you Johnathan!! We really do try to give our customers what they want!!

name: Melissa Lowery
text: Very nice people.

name: Kerry Koehn
text: Great service!!!

name: Leah Jeansonne
text: I enjoyed my time shopping with these ladies, they go out of their way to assist customers.

name: marian fischer
text: I love this little place, not really little, plenty to look at. Always good finds, always! Got these for the grandbaby today!!

name: Clutch Rockefeller
text: Absolutely friendliest staff I've ever met best deals in the whole county absolutely a gold mine will be back they're so good they deserve a tip

name: Rikki Packer
text: Store very neat as I entered. Worker didn't ask me if I needed help. Apparently she could tell that I was there for a pickup, cause she called it out. 😌

name: Cheslee Ladewog
text: Love this place! The owners are so nice!

name: Cindy Baca
text: The ladies here are always very nice and helpful and the place is kept very clean

name: Wriston Helms
text:
Not open to posted hours. Went 3 times, not open.
Update. They come back at my review with a snarky protest and suggest I can't read their sign or tell time.. Nice..
I assure you I can do both well.

The take-home message here is to check their Facebook page to see if they are following their own hours before you drive to the store.
Got it?

resp.text: Our hours are clearly posted on our facebook pg and on our front door of biz as being Tuesday through Saturday 10am to 5pm. If we ever have to close early, we make a sign on the door and post to social media. If we can't get up there we post to social media only. It's a shame that people have to leave vague negative reviews when we rarely close during our regular posted biz hours. If this person would've contacted us after "missing" us the first time we would have done what ever needed to be done to assist this potential customer but odds are they came on a day we are closed (always closed Sunday and monday) or they came after 5pm. It's that simple. I have documented time sheets that prove when our biz is open and many, many days we rarely close right at 5pm to accomodote shoppers in the store!

name: Amanda Sanford
text: Staff was so nice

name: Tonya Medina
text: Merry Christmas Brandi

name: Billy Dodson
text: Very nice people and a nice wide selection. Easy to pass by if you don't know it's there.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review and yes, don't blink or you will miss us. But, once you know where we are, you'll be baaacckkk. We put out new treasures, daily. Thanks again.

name: heather redding
text: Great deals

name: Mardelle Bailey
text: Great place. A large inventory. Employees very friendly.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review for Central Baldwin Thrift!! Hope to see you again soon.

name: Joanna Woodward
text: This is a great thrift shop. The clothes are good quality, and you get service with a smole.

name: Elf Fawn Ruth
text: Really cool thrift store. Better than most, without the crazy prices

name: D Estill
text: These are the sweetest people ever best prices great selection great environment will visit their many more times my mom love this store and so do I

name: Gale Mann
text: They are a little disorganized yet but they're getting there

name: Leslie Allen
text: Friendly, just not finding what i needed

name: linda garner
text: Ok
